table.name: vtiger_adocdetail
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_adocdetail` ( `adocdetailid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `adocdetailno` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `adocdetailname` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `nrline` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `adoctomaster` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `adoc_product` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `adoc_quantity` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `adoc_price` decimal(15,2) DEFAULT NULL, `inout_docnr` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `poteknema` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `posupplier` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `riferimento` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `adoc_stock` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `chiave_adocdetailid` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `pcdetail` varchar(225) DEFAULT NULL, `adocdetail_project` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `paymentstype` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `adocdtax` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `adocdtotalamount` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `adocdtotal` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `nota` text, `richiestaparte` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `codice_articoloadoc` decimal(9,0) DEFAULT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_adocdetailcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_adocdetailcf` ( `adocdetailid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`adocdetailid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
